    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="no">Hele og halve trinn</string>
            <string language="en">Full steps and half steps</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Volle Jobsteps und halbe Jobsteps</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pleines étapes et demi d'étapes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Etapas cheias e meias etapas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Punti completi e punti mezzi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πλήρη βήματα και μισά βήματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pasos de progresión completos y medios pasos de 
progresión</string>
          </title>
          <language>no</language>
          <description>
            <string language="no">Eksperimenter selv med hele og halve trinn! Finn ut hvordan de klinger, hvor de ligger og hvordan de noteres.</string>
            <string language="en">Experimant with full and half steps!How do they sound , where are the placed and how are they noted.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">musikk</string>
            <string language="en">music</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">musikkteori</string>
            <string language="en">music theory</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

            <string language="en">listning</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">music theory</string>
            <string language="en">music theory</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>networked</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Experimant mit voll und halbes steps!How sie 
klingen, wo plaziert sind und wie seien Sie, sie beachteten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Experimant avec complètement et demi de 
steps!How  elles retentissent, où sont placé et comment soyez ils 
ont noté.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Experimant com completamente e o meio steps!How  
elas soam, onde está colocado e como seja anotaram.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Experimant con in pieno e lo steps!How mezzo 
suonano, dove è disposta e come sia hanno notato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Experimant με πλήρες και μισό steps!How ηχούν, 
πού είναι τοποθετημένη και πώς είναι αυτοί σημείωσε.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Experimant con por completo y el medio steps!How
  ellos suenan, donde está haber colocado y cómo sea observaron.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="no">Eleven kan selv eksperimentere med hele og halve trinn for å finne ut hvordan disse klinger, hvor de er plassert på klaviaturet og hvordan de noteres.</string>
            <string language="en">The students can experiment with full and half steps to find out how they sound where they are placed on the piano and how they are noted.</string>
